Subject: New Mission Briefing
Text: "Agent, We have a profile of someone we want you to check out. The name is Earl Falkov, male, age 67. His search history raised a red flag. He was trying to look up how to decrypt files. It could be nothing, but we want you to look into him just to make sure. We've already sent his profile to your Desktop Switcher. Bookmark files you find high priority by right clicking on the files. We'll take a look at them as soon as you send them in. Q."

Subject: New Profile Returned
Text: "Agent, Nice find. We found the original owner of the file you sent. We ran the name through our databases and something caught our attention. The profile of interest belongs to Oswald Porter, male, 35 who caught our attention before. We look forward to seeing what you find on this guy. You can now access his profile through Desktop Switcher. Q."

Subject: New Profile Returned
Text: "Agent, Amazing work. We were able to retreive the profile of Tamara Glass, 26, female. You already know where to access it. We've almost cracked the case. Keep it up. Q."

Subject: No Profile Returned
Text: "Agent, There's nothing about this person that raises any suspicions. Keep digging, agent. Q."
Additional Comments: sent an invalid profile request, return w nothing

Subject: No Profile Returned
Text: "Agent, That person has done nothing but look up cat videos and knitting tutorials. Needless to say, they don't raise any suspicions. Try looking more carefully before requesting a profile next time. Q."
Additional Comments: sent an invalid profile request, return w nothing

Subject: Mission Summary
Text: "Agent, Good work. We finally got something on that whistleblower. Couldn't evade us this time. Our agents will be bringing him in for some questioning by the end of the day. Q."
